title: Prospect Hill 2BR w/Office + Porch - Pets OK-1 Month Free + *No FEE!
posting_body: Ultra nice Prospect Hill 2BR on two living levels!
Modern kitchen with granite and stainless, beautiful hardwood floors, and a dishwasher.
Two good sized bedrooms and a separate office with attached porch.
There is ample street parking in the neighborhood, and pets are accepted.
There's a huge shared back yard as well.
Quick walk to Union Sq or Prospect Hill Park, site of the first raised American flag.
Rentals in this area don't become available often, take a look toda
And one month's rent is free for a lease ending 08/31/2023
Follow us for new listings and real estate news!
